ing: 1/2 pound hot sausage, fried and drained
des: "The sausage, olives, corn, stewed tomatoes, mushrooms and cheese enhance and complement each other very well in this hearty casserole. The rice completes this meal that can be enjoyed at picnics or potlucks."
ins:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
In a 2 quart casserole dish, combine the sausage, black olives, green olives, corn, tomatoes, mushrooms, cheese and rice. Mix all together well.
Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 30 minutes.
